{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15981v1", "title": "Differential modules: a perspective on Bass' question", "summary": "Guided by the $Q$-shaped derived category framework introduced by Holm and
Jorgensen, we provide a differential module analogue of a classical result that
characterises when a finitely generated module over a local commutative
noetherian ring has finite injective dimension. As an application, we
characterise local Cohen-Macaulay rings using the homological algebra of
differential modules.", "main_category": "math.RT", "categories": "math.RT,math.AC", "published": "2025-04-22T15:32:15Z"}
